sakṛt sarvam calayati jñānam eka kṣaṇe tathā
vipāka dharmatā avasthā sarva śukla mayī yadā
prajñāpāramitā jātā jñānam eka kṣaṇe tadā
svapna upameṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā dāna ādi caryā
alakṣa tvam dharmāṇām kṣaṇena ekena vindati
svapnam tad darśinam ca eva dvaya yogena na īkṣate
dharmāṇām advayam tattvam
abhisamaya alaṅkāre prajñāpāramitā upadeśa śāstre
eka kṣaṇa abhisamaya adhikāraḥ saptamaḥ

original: sarvākārāṃ viśuddhiṃ ye dharmāḥ prāptā nirāsravāḥ /
analyzed: sarvākārām viśuddhim ye dharmāḥ prāptāḥ nirāsravāḥ
svābhāvikaḥ muneḥ prakṛti lakṣaṇaḥ
bodhi pakṣa apramāṇāni vimokṣāḥ
nava ātmikā samāpattiḥ kṛtsnam daśavidha ātmikam
abhibhvāyatanāni aṣṭa prakārāṇi prabhedataḥ
araṇā praṇidhi jñānam abhijñāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ
vaśitāḥ daśa
balāni daśa catvāri vaiśāradyāni ārakṣaṇam
trividham smṛti upasthānam tridhā saṃmoṣa dharma tā

original: vāsanāyāḥ samuddhāto mahati karūṇā jane // Abhs_8.5 //
analyzed: vāsanāyāḥ samuddhātaḥ mahati karūṇāḥ jane
āveṇikāḥ muneḥ eva dharmāḥ ye ṣṭādaśā īritāḥ
sarva ākāra jña tā ca iti dharmakāyaḥ bhidhīyate
śravakasya araṇā dṛṣṭeḥ nṛ kleśa parihāri tā
tad kleśa srotaḥ chittyai grāma ādiṣu jina araṇā
anābhogam anāsakm avyāghātam sadā sthitam
sarva praśna apanud vauddham praṇidhi jñānam iṣyate

original: paripākaṃ gate hetau yasya yasya yadā yadā /
analyzed: paripākam gate hetau yasya yasya yadā yadā

original: hitaṃ bhavati kartavyaṃ prathate tasya tasya saḥ // Abhs_8.9 //
analyzed: hitam bhavati kartavyam prathate tasya tasya saḥ

original: varṣatyapi hi parjanye naiva bījaṃ prarohati /
analyzed: varṣati api hi parjanye na eva bījam prarohati
samutpāde pi buddhānām na abhavyaḥ bhadram aśrute
iti kāritra vaipulyāt buddhaḥ vyāpī nirūcyate

original: akṣayatvācca tasyaiva nitya ityapi kathyate // Abhs_8.11 //
analyzed: akṣaya tvāt ca tasya eva nityaḥ iti api kathyate
dvātriṃśat lakṣaṇa aśīti vyañjana ātmā muneḥ ayam
sāṃbhogikaḥ mataḥ kāyaḥ mahāyāna upabhogataḥ
cakra aṅka hastaḥ krākurma pādaḥ

original: karau sapādau tarūṇau mṛdū ca mamutsadaiḥ saptabhirāśrayo 'sya // Abhs_8.13 //
analyzed: karau sa pādau tarūṇau mṛdū ca sya
dīrgha aṅguliḥ vyāyata pārṣṇi gātram prājyam tu ṛju śaṅkha pada ūrdhva romā
eṇeya jaṅghaḥ ca paṭu ūrū bāhuḥ kośa avanaddha uttamavasti guhyaḥ
suvarṇa varṇḥ pratanu chaviḥ ca pradakṣiṇa ekaika sujāta umā

original: ūūrṇāṅkitāsyo haripūrvakāyaḥ skandhau vṛtāvasya citāntarāṃsaḥ // Abhs_8.15 //
analyzed: ūūrṇa aṅkita āsyaḥ hari pūrva kāyaḥ skandhau vṛtau asya citā antarāṃsaḥ
hīnaḥ rasaḥ khyāti nyagrodha vat māṇḍala tulya mūrtiḥ

original: uṣīṣamūrdhā pṛthucārūjihvo brahmasvaraḥ siṃhahanuḥ suśuklāḥ // Abhs_8.16 //
analyzed: uṣīṣa mūrdhā brahma svaraḥ siṃha hanuḥ su śuklāḥ
tulyāḥ pramāṇe viralāḥ ca dantāḥ anyūna saṃkhyāḥ daśikāḥ catasraḥ

original: nīlekśaṇe govṛṣapakṣmanetro dvātriṃśadetāni hi lakṣaṇāni // Abhs_8.17 //
analyzed: nīlekśaṇe govṛṣa pakṣma netraḥ dvātriṃśat etāni hi lakṣaṇāni
yasya yasya atra yaḥ hetuḥ lakṣaṇasya prasādhakaḥ
tasya tasya prapūrya ayam samudāgama lakṣaṇaḥ
gurūṇām anuyāna ādiḥ dṛḍha tā saṃvaram prati

original: saṃgrahāsevanaṃ dānaṃ praṇitasya ca vastunaḥ // Abhs_8.19 //
analyzed: saṃgraha āsevanam dānam praṇitasya ca vastunaḥ
vadhya mokṣa samādānām kuśalasya ca
ityādikaḥ yathāsutram hetuḥ lakṣaṇa sādhakaḥ

original: tāmrāḥ snigdhāśca tuṅgāśca nakhā aṅgulayo muneḥ /
analyzed: tāmrāḥ snigdhāḥ ca tuṅgāḥ ca nakhāḥ aṅgulayaḥ muneḥ
vṛttāḥ citā anupūrvāḥ ca guḍhāḥ nirgranthyaḥ sirāḥ
guḍhau gulphau samau pādau siṃha ibha dvija gopateḥ
vikrāntam dakṣiṇam cārūgamanam ṛju vṛtta tā
mṛṣṭa anupūrte medhya mṛdu tve śuddha gātra tā
pūrṇa vyañjana tā cāru pṛthu maṇḍala gāra tā
sama krama tvam śuddha tvam netrayoḥ sukumāra tā
su saṃhatana gātra tā
su vibhakta aṅga tā dhvānta pradhvasta āloka śuddha tā
vṛtta mṛṣṭa akṣāma kukṣitāḥ ca gabhira tā
dakṣiṇa āvarta tā nābheḥ samanta darśanīya tā
samācāraḥ śuciḥ kāla tilaka apagatā tanuḥ
karau tula mṛdu snigdha gambhīra āyata lekha tā
na atyāyatam vacaḥ bimba pratibimba upama oṣṭha tā

original: mṛdvī tanvī ca raktā ca jihvā jimūtaghoṣatā /
analyzed: mṛdvī tanvī ca raktā ca jihvā

original: cārūmañjasvaro daṃṣṭrā vṛttāstīkṣṇāḥ sitāḥ samāḥ // Abhs_8.28 //
analyzed: daṃṣṭrāḥ vṛttāḥ tīkṣṇāḥ sitāḥ samāḥ
anupurvī gatāḥ tuṅgāḥ nāsikā param śuciḥ
viśale nayane pakṣma citam padma dala akṣitā
āyata ślakṣṇa su snigdha sama romnau bhruvau bhujau
pīna āyatau samau karṇau upaghāta vivarjitau
lalāṭam aparimlānam prṛthu pūrṇa uttamāṅga tā
bhramara ābhāḥ citāḥ ślakṣṇāḥ a saṃlulita mūrtayaḥ
keśāḥ aparuṣāḥ puṃsām saurabhyāni apahāriṇaḥ

original: śrīvatsaḥ svastikaṃ ceti buddhānuvyañjanaṃ matam // Abhs_8.32 //
analyzed: śrīvatsaḥ svastikam ca iti buddha anuvyañjanam matam

original: karoti yena citrāṇi hitāni jagataḥ samam /
analyzed: karoti yena citrāṇi hitāni jagataḥ samam

original: ā bhavātso 'nupacChinnaḥ kayo nairmāṇiko muneḥ // Abhs_8.33 //
analyzed: ā bhavāt saḥ n upacchinnaḥ kayaḥ nairmāṇikaḥ muneḥ
tathā karmā api anucchinnam asya asaṃsāram iṣyate

original: gatīnāṃ śamanaṃ karma saṃgrahe ca caturvidhe // Abhs_8.34 //
analyzed: gatīnām śamanam karma saṃgrahe ca caturvidhe
niveśanam sa saṃkleśe vyavadāna avabodhane
sattvānām artha yāthātmye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu ca
buddha mārge prakṛtyā eva śunyatāyām dvaya kṣaye

original: saṃkete 'nupalambhe ca paripāke ca hehinām // Abhs_8.36 //
analyzed: saṃkete n upalambhe ca paripāke ca hehinām
bodhisattvasya mārge bhiniveśasya nivāraṇe
bodhi prāptu jinakṣetra viśuddhau niyatim prati
aprameye ca sattva arthe buddha sevā ādike guṇe
bodheḥ aṅgeṣu anāśe ca karmaṇām satya darśane
viparyāsa prahāṇe ca tad avastuka tā naye
vyavadāne sa saṃbhāre saṃskṛta a saṃskṛte prati
vyatibheda aparijñāne ca niveśanam
dharmakāyasya karma idam saptavimśatidhā matam
abhisamaya alaṅkāre prajñāpāramitā upadeśa śāstre
dharmakāya adhikāraḥ ṣṭamaḥ
lakṣaṇam tad prayogaḥ tad prakarṣaḥ tad anukramaḥ
tad niṣṭā tad vipākaḥ ca iti anyaḥ
viṣayaḥ tritayaḥ hetuḥ prayogaḥ catur ātmakaḥ
dharma kāyaḥ phalam karma iti anyaḥ tredhā artha saṃgrahaḥ
abhisamayālaṅkāram nāma prajñāpāramitā upadeśa śāstram samāptam
kṛtiḥ ārya maitreya nāthasya
